definition: Three Gorges or Yangtze Gorges, namely: Qutang Gorge 瞿塘峽|瞿塘峡[Qu2 tang2 Xia2], Wuxia Gorge 巫峽|巫峡[Wu1 Xia2] and Xiling Gorge 西陵峽|西陵峡[Xi1 ling2 Xia2]

sentences.english: Three Gorges of Yangtze River are the famous realm of bridges.
sentences.chinese: 长江三峡是举世罕见的桥梁王国。

sentences.english: Three Gorges region in Yangtze River is the cradle of Wu culture.
sentences.chinese: 长江三峡为巫文化的起源之地。

sentences.english: Three Gorges of the Yangtze River are a golden tourism waterway .
sentences.chinese: 长江三峡是旅游的黄金水道。

sentences.english: Cruise Tour is the major component and symbol of the Three Gorges tourism.
sentences.chinese: 游船旅游是长江三峡旅游的主要形式和独特标志。

sentences.english: The scenery as one travels by boat along the Changjiang Three Gorges is marvelous.
sentences.chinese: 坐船游览长江三峡的时候，两岸的风景美不胜收。

sentences.english: Have you been to the Yangtse Gorges?
A great part of the Three Gorges appear now in the territory of Chongqing.
sentences.chinese: 长江三峡的大半段已出现在重庆市境内。

sentences.english: The Three Gorges Project is the backbone project for the regulation and development of the Yangtze.
sentences.chinese: 长江三峡水利枢纽是治理开发长江的关键性骨干工程。

definition: Three Gorges on the Chang Jiang or Yangtze, namely: Qutang Gorge 瞿塘峽|瞿塘峡[Qu2 tang2 Xia2], Wuxia Gorge 巫峽|巫峡[Wu1 Xia2] and Xiling Gorge 西陵峽|西陵峡[Xi1 ling2 Xia2]/Sanxia or Sanhsia town in New Taipei City 新北市[Xin1 bei3 shi4], Taiwan
Xiling Gorge on the Changjiang or Yangtze, the lower of the Three Gorges 三峽|三峡[San1 Xia2]
Wuxia Gorge on the Changjiang or Yangtze, the middle of the Three Gorges 三峽|三峡[San1 Xia2]
Qutang Gorge, 8 km long gorge on the Changjiang or Yangtze in Chongqing 重慶|重庆[Chong2 qing4], the upper of the Three Gorges 三峽|三峡[San1 Xia2]
Three Gorges Dam on the Yangtze River
White Crane Ridge at Fuling, Sichuan on the Changjiang River, that used to show above the water at dry periods, with famous carvings
Jialing river in Sichuan (a tributary of the Yangtze)
name of a peak by the Three Gorges 長江三峽|长江三峡[Chang2 Jiang1 San1 xia2]
Baidi town in Chongqing 重慶|重庆, north of the Changjiang, an important tourist attraction
Mt Wu on the Changjiang River (Yangtze) by the Three Gorges
Wushan county in Wanzhou suburbs of north Chongqing municipality, formerly in Sichuan
